name: Parasite Assassin
description:
Parasite Assassin has you play the role of a parasite that takes control of who ever they infect, but the person will die in 10 seconds causing you to be expelled from them in search of a new host. You have to infect the target and kill them to win the game. 

You have to infect the target and kill them to win the game.

You have a view of the target and have to use the background of the target and map of the city to track them down and kill them. 

Controls:

WASD to move

Game was made for Ludum Dare 51

Theme: Every 10 seconds
